tooltips.title: Slice
tooltips.content:
Lately I've begun to think Slice has as much of an impact on my wins as cards like burst, Wraith form, and catalyst. It especially shines during the act 2 elites, where it deals 6 damage for 0 mana. 
Slice has become an autopick for me until act 3 where the usefulness starts to fall off a bit, I'll even take 3 or 4 copies if they're offered. 
There are still quite a few situations where it shines in act 3, like dealing up to 12 damage to Reptomancer with Phantasmal killer.
